CurrentVersion.title: Outlook:[iOS] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
CurrentVersion.description: Now while writing an email you can reordering the tools, customizing your experience and making your most used actions even easier to reach.

OldVersion.title: Outlook:[iOS] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
OldVersion.description: Now while writing an email you can reordering the tools, customizing your experience and making your most used actions even easier to reach.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Optical character recognition (OCR) support for endpoint
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this update, you will be able to detect and protect sensitive content in images and subsequently apply DLP policies to prevent the exfiltration of that sensitive data on your Windows endpoint devices. This release supports key file types like JPG, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, BMP, and PDF (image only).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Optical character recognition (OCR) support for endpoint
OldVersion.description: ,With this update, you will be able to detect and protect sensitive content in images and subsequently apply DLP policies to prevent the exfiltration of that sensitive data on your Windows endpoint devices. This release supports key file types like JPG, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, BMP, and PDF (image only).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Secure collaboration on labeled and encrypted documents with user-defined permissions (U.S. government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: ,SharePoint and OneDrive can process labeled documents that are encrypted with custom permissions, also referred to as user-defined permissions. As a result, these documents can be searched, inspected for data loss prevention, and used with eDiscovery. They can also be opened, edited, seamlessly co-authored, and support AutoSave in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint apps on all platforms (includes Office for the web).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Secure collaboration on labeled and encrypted documents with user-defined permissions (U.S. government clouds)
OldVersion.description: ,SharePoint and OneDrive can process labeled documents that are encrypted with custom permissions, also referred to as user-defined permissions. As a result, these documents can be searched, inspected for data loss prevention, and used with eDiscovery. They can also be opened, edited, seamlessly co-authored, and support AutoSave in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint apps on all platforms (includes Office for the web).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Sequence detection starting with downloads from third-party sites
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can configure the new sequence feature to detect risky user actions that start with downloading from third-party domains, such as box.com or dropbox.com. This can help security teams gain visibility into actions that take place in their multi-cloud environments that may lead to a data security incident. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Sequence detection starting with downloads from third-party sites
OldVersion.description: ,Admins can configure the new sequence feature to detect risky user actions that start with downloading from third-party domains, such as box.com or dropbox.com. This can help security teams gain visibility into actions that take place in their multi-cloud environments that may lead to a data security incident. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Office App: Idle Session Timeout for Microsoft 365 Web Apps - Government Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: ,Idle session timeout feature allows IT admins to configure a tenant-wide timeout value based on which users get automatically signed out after a period of inactivity on Microsoft 365 web apps. This feature is an improvement over, and will eventually replace, current idle timeout settings in Outlook Web App (OWA) and SharePoint Online (SPO).

OldVersion.title: Office App: Idle Session Timeout for Microsoft 365 Web Apps - Government Cloud
OldVersion.description: ,Idle session timeout feature allows IT admins to configure a tenant-wide timeout value based on which users get automatically signed out after a period of inactivity on Microsoft 365 web apps. This feature is an improvement over, and will eventually replace, current idle timeout settings in Outlook Web App (OWA) and SharePoint Online (SPO).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Power Automate integration (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Initiate a Power Automate workflow when the item reaches the end of its retention period. For example, execute a complex disposition approval process or move the file to an archive.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Power Automate integration (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Initiate a Power Automate workflow when the item reaches the end of its retention period. For example, execute a complex disposition approval process or move the file to an archive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Video Search in Bing, Office.com, and SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: Our new Video vertical on Bing, Office.com, and SharePoint will provide better search capabilities for videos in your organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Video Search in Bing, Office.com, and SharePoint
OldVersion.description: Our new Video vertical on Bing, Office.com, and SharePoint will provide better search capabilities for videos in your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Teams Security
CurrentVersion.description:
,Microsoft Defender for Office 365 will provide protection and enhanced security operations (SecOps) experience for Microsoft Teams. These protection capabilities will include automatic remediation of malicious entities and support for end user reporting. In addition, Microsoft Teams specific attack insights will be included in the unified investigation and response experience in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal, for an optimized SecOps experience.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-365-defender-blog/announcing-collaboration-security-for-microsoft-teams/ba-p/3780487

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Teams Security
OldVersion.description:
,Microsoft Defender for Office 365 will provide protection and enhanced security operations (SecOps) experience for Microsoft Teams. These protection capabilities will include automatic remediation of malicious entities and support for end user reporting. In addition, Microsoft Teams specific attack insights will be included in the unified investigation and response experience in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal, for an optimized SecOps experience.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-365-defender-blog/announcing-collaboration-security-for-microsoft-teams/ba-p/3780487

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Saved views in activity explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,During an alert investigation, analysts usually use various filters and columns in activity explorer to understand the risk activities that may lead to potential data security incidents. With this update, an Insider Risk Management analyst can quickly use a previously configured combination of filters and columns with one click. This can help analysts efficiently work through recurring activities without manually setting up filters every time. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Saved views in activity explorer
OldVersion.description: ,During an alert investigation, analysts usually use various filters and columns in activity explorer to understand the risk activities that may lead to potential data security incidents. With this update, an Insider Risk Management analyst can quickly use a previously configured combination of filters and columns with one click. This can help analysts efficiently work through recurring activities without manually setting up filters every time. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to Gallery View in Teams Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: The updated Gallery View places everyone in tiles of equal size by default (16:9 ratio) whether their video is on or off. Users can also easily change their gallery size, choose to prioritize tiles with video-on, and remove their tile from the main gallery. When a Microsoft Teams Room joins the meeting, video is optimized by enlarging the size by default and users can re-size via the contextual menu. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to Gallery View in Teams Meetings
OldVersion.description: The updated Gallery View places everyone in tiles of equal size by default (16:9 ratio) whether their video is on or off. Users can also easily change their gallery size, choose to prioritize tiles with video-on, and remove their tile from the main gallery. When a Microsoft Teams Room joins the meeting, video is optimized by enlarging the size by default and users can re-size via the contextual menu. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Hide attendee names in Webinars (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can hide the names of attendees from other attendees during a webinar or a meeting, and only organizers and presenters are able to see the names of attendees.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Hide attendee names in Webinars (Premium)
OldVersion.description:
Organizers can hide the names of attendees from
other attendees during a webinar, and only organizers and presenters are able
to see the names of attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Bring your own detections
CurrentVersion.description:
,Allow customers to bring their own user activity indicators from homegrown, SIEM/UEBA platforms, or other line-of-business applications, and leverage them in existing Insider Risk Management playbooks. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Bring your own detections
OldVersion.description:
,Allow customers to bring their own user activity indicators from homegrown, SIEM/UEBA platforms, or other line-of-business applications, and leverage them in existing Insider Risk Management playbooks. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ratings and Reviews for apps in Teams store
CurrentVersion.description: Customers can now view and provide ratings and review for apps in Teams store. Note: GCC will not be released at this time, and we will provide a new Roadmap ID when a date is available. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ratings and Reviews for apps in Teams store
OldVersion.description: Customers can now view and provide ratings and review for apps in Teams store. Note: GCC will not be released at this time, and we will provide a new Roadmap ID when a date is available. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: The new Microsoft Teams app
CurrentVersion.description: The new Teams has been reimagined from the ground up, delivering up to two times faster performance while using 50 percent less memory. It enables users to collaborate with people across organizational boundaries by seamlessly using Teams across multiple tenants or accounts. Note: We are updating the roadmap Environments and Platforms to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Note: We have reverted the release phase to show the current state. Thank you for your patience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: The new Microsoft Teams app
OldVersion.description: The new Teams has been reimagined from the ground up, delivering up to two times faster performance while using 50 percent less memory. It enables users to collaborate with people across organizational boundaries by seamlessly using Teams across multiple tenants or accounts. Note: We are updating the roadmap Environments and Platforms to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Unique join links for external presenters in Webinars
CurrentVersion.description:
When organizers set up events and add external
presenters, these presenters will receive unique join links for the webinar.
This unique link allows the external presenter to automatically bypass the
lobby and join a webinar directly as a presenter role.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Unique join links for external presenters in Webinars
OldVersion.description:
When organizers set up events and add external
presenters, these presenters will receive unique join links for the webinar.
This unique link allows the external presenter to automatically bypass the
lobby and join a webinar directly as a presenter role.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Call delegation feature enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Shared line appearance lets a user choose a delegate to answer or handle calls on their behalf. We are launching a simplified experience for users who have set up call delegation which will be available on the Teams desktop app and Teams phone devices. The new UI will allow delegates to easily switch between the different delegator lines they manage and view call history for the delegator’s line. Delegators will be able to view and join active calls handled by the delegate and grant delegates permission to join active calls. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Call delegation feature enhancements
OldVersion.description: Shared line appearance lets a user choose a delegate to answer or handle calls on their behalf. We are launching a simplified experience for users who have set up call delegation which will be available on the Teams desktop app and Teams phone devices. The new UI will allow delegates to easily switch between the different delegator lines they manage and view call history for the delegator’s line. Delegators will be able to view and join active calls handled by the delegate and grant delegates permission to join active calls. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archive channels
CurrentVersion.description:
With
Archive Channels, owners and administrators can archive channels that are no
longer in use while preserving their content, including messages, files, and
tabs. The archived channel is removed from the active teams and channels list and
no more actions will be allowed. If needed, the channel can be restored.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archive channels
OldVersion.description:
With
Archive Channels, owners and administrators can archive channels that are no
longer in use while preserving their content, including messages, files, and
tabs. The archived channel is removed from the active teams and channels list and
no more actions will be allowed. If needed, the channel can be restored.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Static alert and case IDs
CurrentVersion.description: ,Insider Risk Management will provide static alert and case IDs to help admins track and communicate investigation progress with colleagues more easily. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Static alert and case IDs
OldVersion.description: ,Insider Risk Management will provide static alert and case IDs to help admins track and communicate investigation progress with colleagues more easily. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Granular exclusion
CurrentVersion.description: ,Granular exclusion allows admins to adjust and fine tune indicators according to organizational preferences to help tailor the detection of risks that may lead to a potential security incident. For example, admins can configure the indicator “sending email with attachments to recipients outside the organization” to only detect emails sent to personal domains (e.g., outlook.com). In that way, admins can reduce the number of false positives. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Granular exclusion
OldVersion.description: ,Granular exclusion allows admins to adjust and fine tune indicators according to organizational preferences to help tailor the detection of risks that may lead to a potential security incident. For example, admins can configure the indicator “sending email with attachments to recipients outside the organization” to only detect emails sent to personal domains (e.g., outlook.com). In that way, admins can reduce the number of false positives. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Playlists in the SharePoint List webpart
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow you to display playlists on SharePoint pages using the List webpart. The playlist will display video titles and thumbnails, and people with access to files in the playlist can click on the thumbnails to view the videos.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Playlists in the SharePoint List webpart
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow you to display playlists on SharePoint pages using the List webpart. The playlist will display video titles and thumbnails, and people with access to files in the playlist can click on the thumbnails to view the videos.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - User experience (UX) update
CurrentVersion.description:
This update improves overall performance of
Microsoft Lists and introduces new features, like the ability to add ratings to
any list, drag and/or paste images directly into a list, see who collaborating
with you - and where - in real-time, switch views by clicking tabs, and more.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - User experience (UX) update
OldVersion.description:
This update improves overall performance of
Microsoft Lists and introduces new features, like the ability to add ratings to
any list, drag and/or paste images directly into a list, see who collaborating
with you - and where - in real-time, switch views by clicking tabs, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Out-of-the-box document library templates
CurrentVersion.description:
We
are bringing the goodness of List templates to SharePoint document libraries.
Creating document libraries will now be a breeze with our ready-made templates
with scenario relevant content, structure, metadata, and content types - all to
save you time and maintain broader consistency across your content management
organization.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Out-of-the-box document library templates
OldVersion.description:
We
are bringing the goodness of List templates to SharePoint document libraries.
Creating document libraries will now be a breeze with our ready-made templates
with scenario relevant content, structure, metadata, and content types - all to
save you time and maintain broader consistency across your content management
organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Scope service side auto-labeling for OneDrive workloads to users or groups (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: To scope service side auto-labeling for OneDrive locations, you must specify users or groups. Previously, you had to specify sites by URLs. Any existing OneDrive URL sites in auto-labeling policies will continue to work but before you can specify new OneDrive locations, or for restricted admins, you must first delete any existing site URLs. Groups supported: distribution groups, Microsoft 365 groups, mail-enabled security groups, and security groups.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Scope service side auto-labeling for OneDrive workloads to users or groups (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: To scope service side auto-labeling for OneDrive locations, you must specify users or groups. Previously, you had to specify sites by URLs. Any existing OneDrive URL sites in auto-labeling policies will continue to work but before you can specify new OneDrive locations, or for restricted admins, you must first delete any existing site URLs. Groups supported: distribution groups, Microsoft 365 groups, mail-enabled security groups, and security groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinar Graph APIs
CurrentVersion.description:
The Teams Webinar Graph APIs allows users to get
webinar data like attendee names, attendance duration, registration, and
registrant cancellations. This data can be exported to be used in 3P systems
including CRMs, marketing automation tools, LOB and Workflow apps. These APIs
are designed to support business-to-business workflows.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinar Graph APIs (Premium)
OldVersion.description:
The Teams Webinar Graph APIs allows users to get
webinar data like attendee names, attendance duration, registration, and
registrant cancellations. This data can be exported to be used in 3P systems
including CRMs, marketing automation tools, LOB and Workflow apps. These APIs
are designed to support business-to-business workflows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Click Through Collaborative Annotations Layer
CurrentVersion.description: Users are now able to click through the annotation layer to interact with content in meetings without restarting the current annotation session. Note: We are postponing the rollout of this feature at this time, and it will only be available in the new Teams experience. We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Click Through Collaborative Annotations Layer
OldVersion.description: Users are now able to click through the annotation layer to interact with content in meetings without restarting the current annotation session. Note: We are postponing the rollout of this feature at this time, and it will only be available in the new Teams experience. We apologize for any inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows - ICS support
CurrentVersion.description:
ICS is a file format that holds event and calendar
information and enables users to share that information through email. With
full ICS support in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to view
local ICS files and import them to their calendar. This mimics the experience
currently available in classic Outlook for Windows.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows - ICS support
OldVersion.description:
ICS is a file format that holds event and calendar
information and enables users to share that information through email. With
full ICS support in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to view
local ICS files and import them to their calendar. This mimics the experience
currently available in classic Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Watermark support for recording playback (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Recording can now be enabled for watermarked meetings. An email ID will be displayed as the watermark during the meeting recording playback. Once a meeting has concluded, users can access the recorded content on both web and mobile platforms to watch the recording with watermarking.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Watermark support for recording playback (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Recording can now be enabled for watermarked meetings. An email ID will be displayed as the watermark during the meeting recording playback. Once a meeting has concluded, users can access the recorded content on both web and mobile platforms to watch the recording with watermarking.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Admin Center: Manage apps, App details pages, and Custom app management for GCCH & DoD
CurrentVersion.description:
Teams Admin Center is adding Manage apps and App
details pages to GCCH and DoD. Admins can get a list of all apps present for
their tenant from manage apps page, review app details, allow and block apps,
as well as upload and update custom apps from Teams Admin Center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Admin Center: Manage apps, App details pages, and Custom app management for GCCH & DoD
OldVersion.description:
Teams Admin Center is adding Manage apps and App
details pages to GCCH and DoD. Admins can get a list of all apps present for
their tenant from manage apps page, review app details, allow and block apps,
as well as upload and update custom apps from Teams Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: S/MIME support for sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) sign and encryption as sensitivity label outcome. Admins can define the label to have S/MIME sign, encryption, or both and emails with those labels will enforce S/MIME accordingly.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: S/MIME support for sensitivity labels
OldVersion.description: Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) sign and encryption as sensitivity label outcome. Admins can define the label to have S/MIME sign, encryption, or both and emails with those labels will enforce S/MIME accordingly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Named entity coverage for additional markets and languages
CurrentVersion.description: Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms and conditions. This update expands name and address coverage to an additional 7 countries, such as China and Russia, and expands medical terms and conditions (specifically for the Diseases SIT) to an additional 29 languages covering much of Europe, China, Japan, and Korea.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Named entity coverage for additional markets and languages
OldVersion.description: Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms and conditions. This update expands name and address coverage to an additional 7 countries, such as China and Russia, and expands medical terms and conditions (specifically for the Diseases SIT) to an additional 29 languages covering much of Europe, China, Japan, and Korea.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Named entity coverage for additional markets and languages (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms and conditions. This update expands name and address coverage to an additional 7 countries, such as China and Russia, and expands medical terms and conditions (specifically for the Diseases SIT) to an additional 29 languages covering much of Europe, China, Japan, and Korea.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Named entity coverage for additional markets and languages (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms and conditions. This update expands name and address coverage to an additional 7 countries, such as China and Russia, and expands medical terms and conditions (specifically for the Diseases SIT) to an additional 29 languages covering much of Europe, China, Japan, and Korea.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Configure policy tips as popups for labeled emails and attachments (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Configure DLP rules that display warnings in a popup dialog before sending emails. With this capability, admins can set up rules to provide warnings, require business justifications, or request explicit acknowledgements before sending emails. Furthermore, admins can customize a Compliance URL within a DLP rule, ensuring that end users receive valuable guidance through the popup.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Configure policy tips as popups for labeled emails and attachments (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Configure DLP rules that display warnings in a popup dialog before sending emails. With this capability, admins can set up rules to provide warnings, require business justifications, or request explicit acknowledgements before sending emails. Furthermore, admins can customize a Compliance URL within a DLP rule, ensuring that end users receive valuable guidance through the popup.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support pop-up warning for messages with sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Outlook for Windows native sensitivity labeling will support oversharing pop-up dialogue as AIP plug-in to warn, justify or block email being sent. Admins could use the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to define the oversharing pop-up DLP rules to groups of users. If users have the configured DLP rule trigger when they click send, a warn/justify/block pop up message will show up to make sure customer complies with admin's security double check requirements.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Support pop-up warning for messages with sensitivity labels
OldVersion.description: Outlook for Windows native sensitivity labeling will support oversharing pop-up dialogue as AIP plug-in to warn, justify or block email being sent. Admins could use the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to define the oversharing pop-up DLP rules to groups of users. If users have the configured DLP rule trigger when they click send, a warn/justify/block pop up message will show up to make sure customer complies with admin's security double check requirements.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-call user experience
CurrentVersion.description:
Making it easier for
users to access calling capabilities with a redesigned user experience during
calls.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-call user experience
OldVersion.description:
Making it easier for
users to access calling capabilities with a redesigned user experience during
calls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Export APIs
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to export Viva Goals data via public APIs.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Export APIs
OldVersion.description: ,Customers will be able to export Viva Goals data via public APIs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Advanced trainable classifiers to detect workplace safety scenarios
CurrentVersion.description: ,Advanced trainable classifiers to detect workplace safety scenarios: New detections are being added to Communication Compliance that enables you to build safer online environments by detecting potential hate and violence then assigning severity scores to unsafe text across languages. These classifiers are built using large language models. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance?provides the tools to help?organizations detect business conduct and?regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are?opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.?

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Advanced trainable classifiers to detect workplace safety scenarios
OldVersion.description: ,Advanced trainable classifiers to detect workplace safety scenarios: New detections are being added to Communication Compliance that enables you to build safer online environments by detecting potential hate and violence then assigning severity scores to unsafe text across languages. These classifiers are built using large language models. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance?provides the tools to help?organizations detect business conduct and?regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are?opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.?

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Mexico datacenter region and Advanced Data Residency availability
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 will launch a new local cloud region in Mexico. The Advanced Data Residency add-on ("ADR") will be available in Mexico and provide eligible customers with committed data residency in the Mexico local cloud region, prioritized tenant migration services, and expanded coverage of Microsoft 365 workloads and Customer Data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Mexico datacenter region and Advanced Data Residency availability
OldVersion.description: Microsoft 365 will launch a new local cloud region in Mexico. The Advanced Data Residency add-on ("ADR") will be available in Mexico and provide eligible customers with committed data residency in the Mexico local cloud region, prioritized tenant migration services, and expanded coverage of Microsoft 365 workloads and Customer Data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Merge and Extract PDFs in OneDrive for Web
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Syntex: Combine two or more PDF files into a new PDF file with the Merge PDFs action, or split PDF pages into new PDF files with the Extract pages action, in OneDrive for Web.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Merge and Extract PDFs in OneDrive for Web
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Syntex: Combine two or more PDF files into a new PDF file with the Merge PDFs action, or split PDF pages into new PDF files with the Extract pages action, in OneDrive for Web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Taxonomy tagging
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to turn on Taxonomy tagger in SharePoint document libraries on a pay-as-you-go basis. With Taxonomy tagger turned on, you can automatically tag documents that reside on SharePoint libraries with terms configured in the Taxonomy store using AI. Note: This feature will not be available for GCC organizations at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience and will communicate new timelines for GCC via Message Center, when appropriate.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Taxonomy tagging
OldVersion.description: Customers will be able to turn on Taxonomy tagger in SharePoint document libraries on a pay-as-you-go basis. With Taxonomy tagger turned on, you can automatically tag documents that reside on SharePoint libraries with terms configured in the Taxonomy store using AI. Note: This feature will not be available for GCC organizations at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience and will communicate new timelines for GCC via Message Center, when appropriate.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
OldVersion.description: ,Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Create Simulations with Attack Simulation Training Graph API
CurrentVersion.description:
Introducing the Attack Simulation Training Graph
APIs for creating and managing phishing simulations and training campaigns with
enhanced control and flexibility. Automate and customize attack scenarios based
on real events within your organization to effectively identify vulnerabilities
and test security measures. Seamlessly integrate with other security tools to
streamline analytics and achieve centralized management for enhanced
efficiency.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Create Simulations with Attack Simulation Training Graph API
OldVersion.description:
Introducing the Attack Simulation Training Graph
APIs for creating and managing phishing simulations and training campaigns with
enhanced control and flexibility. Automate and customize attack scenarios based
on real events within your organization to effectively identify vulnerabilities
and test security measures. Seamlessly integrate with other security tools to
streamline analytics and achieve centralized management for enhanced
efficiency.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Rosters supporting container sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Organization admins will now be able to apply container labels to rosters in Microsoft Planner. This is enabled directly in Planner and by using Microsoft Graph APIs. Rosters are created automatically for task lists in Microsoft Loop. Tenant admins can make container labels for these rosters mandatory and set a default label, or not make them mandatory. The roster and the Planner plan contained by the Roster then follow container policy settings. For Graph API requests, if labels are mandatory as per tenant settings, roster creation fails if a label is not provided at the time of request.

OldVersion.title: Planner: Rosters supporting container sensitivity labels
OldVersion.description: Organization admins will now be able to apply container labels to rosters in Microsoft Planner. This is enabled directly in Planner and by using Microsoft Graph APIs. Rosters are created automatically for task lists in Microsoft Loop. Tenant admins can make container labels for these rosters mandatory and set a default label, or not make them mandatory. The roster and the Planner plan contained by the Roster then follow container policy settings. For Graph API requests, if labels are mandatory as per tenant settings, roster creation fails if a label is not provided at the time of request.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New calendar views on Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The calendar on Teams Rooms on Android gets a new look and expanded functionalities. Users can view the calendar for the current and next day. Any available 11 minute or more time slots are shown. A visual indicator (green/purple vertical bar) is added to each time slot for users to easily see whether a room is booked or available. Available in all Teams Rooms licenses.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New calendar views on Teams Rooms on Android
OldVersion.description: The calendar on Teams Rooms on Android gets a new look and expanded functionalities. Users can view the calendar for the current and next day. Any available 11 minute or more time slots are shown. A visual indicator (green/purple vertical bar) is added to each time slot for users to easily see whether a room is booked or available. Available in all Teams Rooms licenses.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved View switcher and Front of Room display controls for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The updated interface for the Teams Rooms on Android View Switcher menu provides end users with more control of the front of room display(s) during a meeting and enables customizations including visibility of the meeting chat and which meeting component is displayed on the left and right panel for Front Row. IT admins can configure the default number of panels and default component on panel(s) using the local device setting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved View switcher and Front of Room display controls for Teams Rooms on Android
OldVersion.description: The updated interface for the Teams Rooms on Android View Switcher menu provides end users with more control of the front of room display(s) during a meeting and enables customizations including visibility of the meeting chat and which meeting component is displayed on the left and right panel for Front Row. IT admins can configure the default number of panels and default component on panel(s) using the local device setting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling Cloud IntelliFrame for Teams Rooms in the new Microsoft Teams app
CurrentVersion.description:
Online meeting participants will now be able to
experience a meeting with Cloud IntelliFrame in the new Microsoft Teams app.
With Cloud IntelliFrame, in-room participants appear similar to remote
attendees, creating an immersive and engaging experience for everyone. Whether
working from home or in the office, participants can gather more context about
the physical shared space and are able to see every facial expression and cue,
just as if they were there in person. Cloud IntelliFrame is only available with
a Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling Cloud IntelliFrame for Teams Rooms in the new Microsoft Teams app
OldVersion.description:
Online meeting participants will now be able to
experience a meeting with Cloud IntelliFrame in the new Microsoft Teams app.
With Cloud IntelliFrame, in-room participants appear similar to remote
attendees, creating an immersive and engaging experience for everyone. Whether
working from home or in the office, participants can gather more context about
the physical shared space and are able to see every facial expression and cue,
just as if they were there in person. Cloud IntelliFrame is only available with
a Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Virtual Appointments Analytics updates (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Tenant admins can see updated analytics with new insights inside the Teams Virtual Appointments app, including average lobby wait times for scheduled vs. on-demand appointments, percentage of appointments completed after scheduled end time, and percentage of appointments with a late start.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Virtual Appointments Analytics updates (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Tenant admins can see updated analytics with new insights inside the Teams Virtual Appointments app, including average lobby wait times for scheduled vs. on-demand appointments, percentage of appointments completed after scheduled end time, and percentage of appointments with a late start.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie: automatically listen to multiple channels
CurrentVersion.description:
Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that enables
clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to
communicate instantly on a channel. Through this new functionality, users can
now connect to, up to 5 favorite channels in multi-channel mode, automatically
listen to incoming transmission from these favorited channels and initiate
easily initiate PTT transmission on these channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook : Upload and share documents through OneDrive on large emails
CurrentVersion.description:
When you try to attach a file to an email
message that has hit the maximum size limit, or when an attachment will push
the email over that limit, you will be prompted to upload the file to the
OneDrive account associated with the email so that you can still easily
share the document.

OldVersion.title: Outlook : Upload and share documents through OneDrive on large emails
OldVersion.description:
When you try to attach a file to an email
message that has hit the maximum size limit, or when an attachment will push
the email over that limit, you will be prompted to upload the file to the
OneDrive account associated with the email so that you can still easily
share the document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Branded Meetings - Join Launcher Screen with Brand Image and Logo Support (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
The Teams Join
Launcher web page will now support the brand logo and brand image uploaded for
branded meetings. This is a Teams Premium feature.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Branded Meetings - Join Launcher Screen with Brand Image and Logo Support (Premium)
OldVersion.description:
The Teams Join
Launcher web page will now support the brand logo and brand image uploaded for
branded meetings. This is a Teams Premium feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Shortcuts for Calls in Teams
CurrentVersion.description:
We
are changing the keyboard shortcuts used to initiate calls in Teams to create
differentiation from other commonly used shortcuts and reduce accidental calls.
The new shortcuts for Windows will be: Alt + Shift + A to initiate audio calls,
Alt + Shift + V for video calls. For MacOs the new short cuts will be:Option +
Shift + A to initiate audio calls, Option + Shift + V for video calls.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Shortcuts for Calls in Teams
OldVersion.description:
We
are changing the keyboard shortcuts used to initiate calls in Teams to create
differentiation from other commonly used shortcuts and reduce accidental calls.
The new shortcuts for Windows will be: Alt + Shift + A to initiate audio calls,
Alt + Shift + V for video calls. For MacOs the new short cuts will be:Option +
Shift + A to initiate audio calls, Option + Shift + V for video calls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Matched items in audit logs
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability you will get visibility into matched condition and value in Audit Logs as a result of a DLP policy match.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Matched items in audit logs
OldVersion.description: With this capability you will get visibility into matched condition and value in Audit Logs as a result of a DLP policy match.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Enhanced Planner integration
CurrentVersion.description:
With the enhanced Viva Goals integration
with Microsoft Planner, users can now filter their tasks by buckets and
labels, and integrate directly with specific tasks, enabling easier portfolio
management and customizability for how your organization structures planning.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Enhanced Planner integration
OldVersion.description:
With the enhanced Viva Goals integration
with Microsoft Planner, users can now filter their tasks by buckets and
labels, and integrate directly with specific tasks, enabling easier portfolio
management and customizability for how your organization structures planning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Desktop to web browser join experience for attendees in Virtual Appointments
CurrentVersion.description:
Schedulers can enable
the 'have attendees join from a web browser' setting so that attendees joining
the virtual appointment on desktop will be routed to the Teams web browser
experience. This allows attendees to have access to engagement features including
raise hand and live reactions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Desktop to web browser join experience for attendees in Virtual Appointments
OldVersion.description:
Schedulers can enable
the 'have attendees join from a web browser' setting so that attendees joining
the virtual appointment on desktop will be routed to the Teams web browser
experience. This allows attendees to have access to engagement features including
raise hand and live reactions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Simplified integration discoverability and set-up experience
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to easily find and setup integrations to reduce manual check in work.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Simplified integration discoverability and set-up experience
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to easily find and setup integrations to reduce manual check in work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Enhanced progress tracking with ADO Integration
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now track progress based on ADO fields such as effort, story points, in addition to the existing item level completion tracking.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Enhanced progress tracking with ADO Integration
OldVersion.description: Users can now track progress based on ADO fields such as effort, story points, in addition to the existing item level completion tracking.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Incoming webhook connector in GCC-H
CurrentVersion.description: Incoming webhook connector can be enabled/uploaded by Tenant admins in GCC-H.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Incoming webhook connector in GCC-H
OldVersion.description: Incoming webhook connector can be enabled/uploaded by Tenant admins in GCC-H.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Ability to hide Favorites from folder list
CurrentVersion.description:
The Hide Favorites
feature allows users to personalize their folder pane by hiding the Favorites
section. By default, Favorites will be visible, but with this feature, users
have the option to hide the Favorites experience from their view. Once hidden,
users can always go back and unhide their Favorites.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Ability to hide Favorites from folder list
OldVersion.description:
The Hide Favorites
feature allows users to personalize their folder pane by hiding the Favorites
section. By default, Favorites will be visible, but with this feature, users
have the option to hide the Favorites experience from their view. Once hidden,
users can always go back and unhide their Favorites.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention - New predicates for endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this capability, admins can extend the below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint - Document is unscannable- Document didn't complete scanning-  Document name matches patterns- Document size equals or is greater than.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention - New predicates for endpoint DLP
OldVersion.description: ,With this capability, admins can extend the below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint - Document is unscannable- Document didn't complete scanning-  Document name matches patterns- Document size equals or is greater than.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Manage Microsoft Surface Hub as a Teams Rooms on Windows device
CurrentVersion.description:
With the transition
of Microsoft Surface Hub devices to the Teams Rooms on Windows platform, Admins
can now manage Surface Hub devices as Teams Rooms on Windows devices in the
Teams Admin Center and Teams Rooms Pro Management (available for Teams Rooms Pro
license customers).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Manage Microsoft Surface Hub as a Teams Rooms on Windows device
OldVersion.description:
With the transition
of Microsoft Surface Hub devices to the Teams Rooms on Windows platform, Admins
can now manage Surface Hub devices as Teams Rooms on Windows devices in the
Teams Admin Center and Teams Rooms Pro Management (available for Teams Rooms Pro
license customers).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Auto labeling (for files at rest in SharePoint Online) can now label PDF files
CurrentVersion.description: This feature enables you to label PDF files at rest via the auto-labeling engine as you would Word, Excel, or PowerPoint files.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Auto labeling (for files at rest in SharePoint Online) can now label PDF files
OldVersion.description: This feature enables you to label PDF files at rest via the auto-labeling engine as you would Word, Excel, or PowerPoint files.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- New reports page
CurrentVersion.description:
,A new reports page will be available in Insider Risk Management. The three charts available on the alerts page -- including total alerts that need review, average time to resolve alerts, and alerts summary -- will be moving to the new reports page.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- New reports page
OldVersion.description:
,A new reports page will be available in Insider Risk Management. The three charts available on the alerts page -- including total alerts that need review, average time to resolve alerts, and alerts summary -- will be moving to the new reports page.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Keyword highlight support for document trainable classifiers
CurrentVersion.description: Highlight the keywords/phrases that are contributing significantly to the Trainable classifier results, so that users can easily understand the classification of the documents. This would build trust of the users of the OOB classifications and empower them to create DLP policies.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Keyword highlight support for document trainable classifiers
OldVersion.description: Highlight the keywords/phrases that are contributing significantly to the Trainable classifier results, so that users can easily understand the classification of the documents. This would build trust of the users of the OOB classifications and empower them to create DLP policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quickly capture content in Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature enables
you to quickly capture content shared in a Teams meeting on a mobile device and
save it in your photo gallery or share in Teams and other apps. We’ll honor
privacy choices set in the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quickly capture content in Teams mobile
OldVersion.description:
This feature enables
you to quickly capture content shared in a Teams meeting on a mobile device and
save it in your photo gallery or share in Teams and other apps. We’ll honor
privacy choices set in the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Notifications for @mentions in mail and documents
CurrentVersion.description: Now you'll receive a notification when you're @mentioned in an email, document, or loop. To view your notifications, tap the bell icon to the upper right of the message list.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Notifications for @mentions in mail and documents
OldVersion.description: Now you'll receive a notification when you're @mentioned in an email, document, or loop. To view your notifications, tap the bell icon to the upper right of the message list.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Contextual evidence match for endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: With this update you will be able to see the matched sensitive information type and the context surrounding it (300 characters) as a result of a DLP policy match on your endpoint devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Contextual evidence match for endpoint DLP
OldVersion.description: With this update you will be able to see the matched sensitive information type and the context surrounding it (300 characters) as a result of a DLP policy match on your endpoint devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Paste as plain text on iOS
CurrentVersion.description: You can now paste as plain text, removing all formatting with ease.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Paste as plain text on iOS
OldVersion.description: You can now paste as plain text, removing all formatting with ease.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva : Connections Boosted News Notifications
CurrentVersion.description:
As an enhancement to the existing news notifications in Viva Connections, users will now also receive a news notifications when news is boosted on the organisation's news site and the news post has an audience target set.
The navigational behaviour will be the same as existing news notifications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva : Connections Boosted News Notifications
OldVersion.description:
As an enhancement to the existing news notifications in Viva Connections, users will now also receive a news notifications when news is boosted on the organisation's news site and the news post has an audience target set.
The navigational behaviour will be the same as existing news notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - PowerShell hold removal cmdlet for legacy and orphaned holds
CurrentVersion.description: This Cmdlet will be available in the Security & Compliance PowerShell and will enable users to get a list of holds stamped on a location (Mailbox/SPO) and remove a given hold from the location by specifying the ID.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - PowerShell hold removal cmdlet for legacy and orphaned holds
OldVersion.description: This Cmdlet will be available in the Security & Compliance PowerShell and will enable users to get a list of holds stamped on a location (Mailbox/SPO) and remove a given hold from the location by specifying the ID.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - PowerShell hold removal cmdlet for legacy and orphaned holds
CurrentVersion.description: This Cmdlet will be available in the Security & Compliance PowerShell and will enable users to get a list of holds stamped on a location (Mailbox/SPO) and remove a given hold from the location by specifying the ID.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - PowerShell hold removal cmdlet for legacy and orphaned holds
OldVersion.description: This Cmdlet will be available in the Security & Compliance PowerShell and will enable users to get a list of holds stamped on a location (Mailbox/SPO) and remove a given hold from the location by specifying the ID.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Post articles in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: With articles, you can write longer, more thoughtful posts with inline images, sections, headings, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Ending the Microsoft Purview legacy alerts ingestion into Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description: ,To increase the relevance of DLP alerts and incidents in Microsoft 365 Defender portal, we are ending the flow of the following legacy alerts into Microsoft 365 Defender portal: eDiscovery Search started or exported, successful exact data match upload, retention auto-labeling policy simulation completed, unusual volume of DLP policy matches, failed exact data match upload, MIP autolabel simulation completed, unusual volume of external file sharing, and unusual volume of file deletion. These alerts were created as a result of legacy standalone alert policies. For a better experience, we recommend using the alerting toggle in the DLP policy authoring experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Ending the Microsoft Purview legacy alerts ingestion into Microsoft 365 Defender portal
OldVersion.description: ,To increase the relevance of DLP alerts and incidents in Microsoft 365 Defender portal, we are ending the flow of the following legacy alerts into Microsoft 365 Defender portal: eDiscovery Search started or exported, successful exact data match upload, retention auto-labeling policy simulation completed, unusual volume of DLP policy matches, failed exact data match upload, MIP autolabel simulation completed, unusual volume of external file sharing, and unusual volume of file deletion. These alerts were created as a result of legacy standalone alert policies. For a better experience, we recommend using the alerting toggle in the DLP policy authoring experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
CurrentVersion.description:
Users can access the
Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their
sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when
needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Configure Teams meetings with protection for sensitive data on a mobile device
CurrentVersion.description:
Users
can collaborate in a way that meets compliance standards in meetings on a
mobile device by picking sensitivity labels on Teams calendar. The labels will
follow all the rules that have been set by the administrators, and they will
apply to the users in the tenant.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Hide sent messages in conversation mode
CurrentVersion.description: ,Sent messages in the conversation mode can be hidden by updating the settings to exclude them in the conversation mode.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Hide sent messages in conversation mode
OldVersion.description: ,Sent messages in the conversation mode can be hidden by updating the settings to exclude them in the conversation mode.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multi-instance app customization support for Teams apps
CurrentVersion.description:
IT
admin has the ability to customize Teams apps to align with the company’s brand
and enhance their usefulness for employees. By creating and managing multiple
customized app instances, it can improve branding, awareness, and user
engagement, overcomes the limitations of a single-instance approach and enables
greater adaptability to meet the diverse business needs.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multi-instance app customization support for Teams apps
OldVersion.description:
IT
admin has the ability to customize Teams apps to align with the company’s brand
and enhance their usefulness for employees. By creating and managing multiple
customized app instances, it can improve branding, awareness, and user
engagement, overcomes the limitations of a single-instance approach and enables
greater adaptability to meet the diverse business needs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New settings available for your frontline manager in Shifts app
CurrentVersion.description: In the Shifts app, we are rolling out the ability for frontline manager to control additional functionalities through our Shifts settings page. Frontline managers will gain the ability to enable and disable swap shift request, offer shift request and/or time off requests for their teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New settings available for your frontline manager in Shifts app
OldVersion.description: In the Shifts app, we are rolling out the ability for frontline manager to control additional functionalities through our Shifts settings page. Frontline managers will gain the ability to enable and disable swap shift request, offer shift request and/or time off requests for their teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Insider risk insights in DLP alerts
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update, a DLP analyst with the right permissions can access an insider risk summary of user activities that may lead to potential data security incidents, as a part of the DLP alert investigation experience in Microsoft Purview and Microsoft Defender. This feature can help analysts gain context of a DLP alert and make more informed decisions on responses to potential incidents.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) Jobs report - access for eDiscovery Manager
CurrentVersion.description: ,The access to the Jobs Report in eDiscovery (Premium) will be extended to eDiscovery Managers. eD Managers will be able to view the tenant wide quota available and list of jobs in the cases they have access to.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) Jobs report - access for eDiscovery Manager
OldVersion.description: ,The access to the Jobs Report in eDiscovery (Premium) will be extended to eDiscovery Managers. eD Managers will be able to view the tenant wide quota available and list of jobs in the cases they have access to.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Word transforms your writing with efficiency and creativity—create, summarize, ask questions, refine, and elevate your documents. Copilot in Word can now help you to draft content, bring in specific information from other documents into your content, generate summaries, ask questions about your document, get ideas about specific topics, and even transform text into tables or provide suggestions for ways to rewrite your content.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Word: Copilot in Word
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in Word transforms your writing with efficiency and creativity—create, summarize, ask questions, refine, and elevate your documents. Copilot in Word can now help you to draft content, bring in specific information from other documents into your content, generate summaries, ask questions about your document, get ideas about specific topics, and even transform text into tables or provide suggestions for ways to rewrite your content.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot-word

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Copilot in Excel
CurrentVersion.description:
,Copilot in Excel helps you do more with your data in Excel tables by generating formula column suggestions, showing insights in charts and PivotTables, and highlighting interesting portions of data.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Excel: Copilot in Excel
OldVersion.description:
,Copilot in Excel helps you do more with your data in Excel tables by generating formula column suggestions, showing insights in charts and PivotTables, and highlighting interesting portions of data.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot-excel

CurrentVersion.title: PowerPoint: Copilot in PowerPoint
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in PowerPoint is a tool that can help you create, edit and understand presentations. It can draft a presentation based on your topic or Word doc, or add slides and images for you. It can design using your template, organize your slides, and summarize and extract the main points from a longer presentation.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: PowerPoint: Copilot in PowerPoint
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in PowerPoint is a tool that can help you create, edit and understand presentations. It can draft a presentation based on your topic or Word doc, or add slides and images for you. It can design using your template, organize your slides, and summarize and extract the main points from a longer presentation.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot-powerpoint

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Copilot in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Outlook helps you stay on top of your inbox and create impactful communication in a fraction of the time. Copilot can now summarize an email thread and quickly jump to the source of the summarized content, suggest action items, and draft new messages or replies. Copilot also coaches you on how to best get your message across and you can adjust the tone and length of your message. These features will be available in Outlook for Mac, web, iOS, Android, and the new Outlook for Windows.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Copilot in Outlook
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in Outlook helps you stay on top of your inbox and create impactful communication in a fraction of the time. Copilot can now summarize an email thread and quickly jump to the source of the summarized content, suggest action items, and draft new messages or replies. Copilot also coaches you on how to best get your message across and you can adjust the tone and length of your message. These features will be available in Outlook for Mac, web, iOS, Android, and the new Outlook for Windows.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot-outlook

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Copilot in Whiteboard
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Whiteboard helps you kickstart and accelerate your ideation process to generate, categorize, and summarize your ideas.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Copilot in Whiteboard
OldVersion.description:
Copilot
in Whiteboard helps you kickstart and accelerate your ideation process to generate, categorize, and summarize your ideas.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot in OneNote
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in OneNote helps you revolutionize the way you plan and organize by staying better prepared and proactively taking action from notes. Now you can gain deeper insights on your notes by asking comprehensive questions, generating summaries of your content, asking Copilot to generate content for you, and helping make your writing clearer.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot in OneNote
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in OneNote helps you revolutionize the way you plan and organize by staying better prepared and proactively taking action from notes. Now you can gain deeper insights on your notes by asking comprehensive questions, generating summaries of your content, asking Copilot to generate content for you, and helping make your writing clearer.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot-onenote

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Copilot in Microsoft 365 Loop
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Loop helps you unlock the power of shared thinking—co-create, get up to speed, and stay in sync with your teammates. Now you can iterate with Copilot collaboratively as a team, co-create prompts, generate tables to help organize team projects, catch up where your teammates left off, summarize page content, and generate a recap for a teammate you're handing work off to.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Copilot in Microsoft 365 Loop
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in Loop helps you unlock the power of shared thinking—co-create, get up to speed, and stay in sync with your teammates. Now you can iterate with Copilot collaboratively as a team, co-create prompts, generate tables to help organize team projects, catch up where your teammates left off, summarize page content, and generate a recap for a teammate you're handing work off to.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot-loop

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Microsoft Teams helps users stay organized and on top of all their information in chat, meetings, and calls, with the ability to ask Copilot any question and discover insights. Use one of the suggested prompts or enter a free text question of your own.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Microsoft Teams
OldVersion.description:
Copilot
in Microsoft Teams helps users stay organized and on top of all their
information in chat, meetings, and calls, with the ability to ask Copilot any
question and discover insights. Use one of the suggested prompts or enter a
free text question of your own.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Copilot: Microsoft 365 Chat
CurrentVersion.description:
Your single destination to take on any task. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, and other apps, to help you draft content, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. It's available via multiple surfaces, including microsoft365.com, Teams, and Bing.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Copilot: Microsoft 365 Chat
OldVersion.description: Your single destination to take on any task. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, and other apps, to help you draft content, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. It's available via multiple surfaces, including microsoft365.com, Teams, and Bing.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Containers in Visio for the web
CurrentVersion.description:
Containers are a powerful tool for organizing
and managing complex diagrams. Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2
license will be able to use containers in Visio for the web to create
professional-looking diagrams that are easy to understand and navigate.
