CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Classic Outlook for Windows - Summarize by Copilot
CurrentVersion.description:
,Copilot combines the power of LLMs and Outlook data to help you do more. Copilot can summarize email threads and extract key points.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Classic Outlook for Windows - Summarize by Copilot
OldVersion.description: ,Copilot combines the power of LLMs and Outlook data to help you do more. Copilot can summarize email threads and extract key points.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Staged Rollout for Graph Connectors
CurrentVersion.description:
Staged rollout is a feature that allows you to gradually introduce
Microsoft Graph connectors to a select group of users in your production
environment. You can use it to deploy an existing or new connection to a
limited set of users, monitor the performance, and adjust settings as needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery Premium-Enhancements to eDiscovery experience for Microsoft Forms content
CurrentVersion.description: ,Now admins can search for Microsoft Forms content specifically within their collections, see the full metadata associated to those items including the Form title, and review both the original Form and responses to the Form as related items within both review and export. Simplification and ease of use for managing Forms content via eDiscovery will help reduce the pain points of challenging discovery process and improve the confidence of organizations using Forms for critical tasks that may require eDiscovery capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer
CurrentVersion.description:
Org Explorer for Outlook
helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work
teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in the new Outlook
for Windows and web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Catch Up Improvements on Web
CurrentVersion.description: Catch Up allows you to stay in sync with your collaborators in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint by showing you the latest comment activity that is directed at you and a summary of recent changes. Based on your feedback, we made improvements to the Catch Up feature. The comment activity directed at you will now persist in Catch Up between sessions for up to 28 days. New items will be indicated with a blue dot for clarity. You can also dismiss items individually if you do not wish to keep them in Catch Up.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Catch Up Improvements on Web
OldVersion.description: Catch Up allows you to stay in sync with your collaborators in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint by showing you the latest comment activity that is directed at you and a summary of recent changes. Based on your feedback, we made improvements to the Catch Up feature. The comment activity directed at you will now persist in Catch Up between sessions for up to 28 days. New items will be indicated with a blue dot for clarity. You can also dismiss items individually if you do not wish to keep them in Catch Up.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: new roles added for built-in Compliance Administrator, Information Protection, and Privacy Management related role groups.
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview provides a unified solution for managing data security, governance, compliance, and privacy across your organization's landscape.  Microsoft Purview built-in role groups are being extended with new roles to prepare for upcoming features and capabilities relevant to those role groups. Additional roles will be added to Microsoft Purview built-in role groups for Compliance Administrator, Information Protection related role groups, and Privacy Management related role groups.  This change will not disrupt the current capabilities for these role groups, it will enable admins in these built-in groups to manage additional data types in the future.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: new roles added for built-in Compliance Administrator, Information Protection, and Privacy Management related role groups.
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview provides a unified solution for managing data security, governance, compliance, and privacy across your organization's landscape.  Microsoft Purview built-in role groups are being extended with new roles to prepare for upcoming features and capabilities relevant to those role groups. Additional roles will be added to Microsoft Purview built-in role groups for Compliance Administrator, Information Protection related role groups, and Privacy Management related role groups.  This change will not disrupt the current capabilities for these role groups, it will enable admins in these built-in groups to manage additional data types in the future.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for Microsoft 365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities that help with security and compliance of data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: New features to record your screen in Stream
CurrentVersion.description: Record your screen with fun picture-in-picture shapes, new layouts, and easy access to the teleprompter.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Unified fun picker
CurrentVersion.description:
Users can now find all their emojis, GIFs, and
stickers in a combined picker. Browse and discover all the fun stuff you need,
all in one hub of content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Unified fun picker
OldVersion.description:
Users can now find all their emojis, GIFs, and
stickers in a combined picker. Browse and discover all the fun stuff you need,
all in one hub of content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Information Protection: Secure collaboration on labeled and encrypted documents with user-defined permissions
CurrentVersion.description: ,SharePoint and OneDrive can process labeled documents that are encrypted with custom permissions, also referred to as user-defined permissions. As a result, these documents can be searched, inspected for data loss prevention, and used with eDiscovery. They can also be opened, edited, seamlessly co-authored, and support AutoSave in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint apps on all platforms (includes Office for the web).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Information Protection: Secure collaboration on labeled and encrypted documents with user-defined permissions
OldVersion.description: ,SharePoint and OneDrive can process labeled documents that are encrypted with custom permissions, also referred to as user-defined permissions. As a result, these documents can be searched, inspected for data loss prevention, and used with eDiscovery. They can also be opened, edited, seamlessly co-authored, and support AutoSave in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint apps on all platforms (includes Office for the web).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Information Protection: Extend sensitivity labels to assets in Azure
CurrentVersion.description:
,With Microsoft Purview, you can now extend the reach of your Information Protection sensitivity labels and the value from built-in sensitive information types to a much broader set of data locations and data types. Use existing sensitivity labels or create new sensitivity labels via the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to extend security and compliance intent to data assets in Azure. Note: We are no longer moving forward with the feature at this time, we apologize for any inconvenience.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/purview/create-sensitivity-label

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Information Protection: Extend sensitivity labels to assets in Azure
OldVersion.description:
,With Microsoft Purview, you can now extend the reach of your Information Protection sensitivity labels and the value from built-in sensitive information types to a much broader set of data locations and data types. Use existing sensitivity labels or create new sensitivity labels via the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to extend security and compliance intent to data assets in Azure.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/purview/create-sensitivity-label

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pop out shared content into a separate window
CurrentVersion.description: Users can pop out shared meeting content in a separate window.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pop out shared content into a separate window
OldVersion.description: Users can pop out shared meeting content in a separate window.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Mind maps in Visio for the web
CurrentVersion.description: Brainstorm and capture information in a structured format that makes it easy to understand and recall with new mind map shapes in Visio for the web.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Mind maps in Visio for the web
OldVersion.description: Brainstorm and capture information in a structured format that makes it easy to understand and recall with new mind map shapes in Visio for the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection – Optical character recognition (OCR) in Exchange Online and Teams DLP
CurrentVersion.description: ,Optical character recognition (OCR) support extracts text from images and will help discover and protect sensitive data in images being shared in Exchange Online (EXO) and Teams Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policies.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection – Optical character recognition (OCR) in Exchange Online and Teams DLP
OldVersion.description: ,Optical character recognition (OCR) support extracts text from images and will help discover and protect sensitive data in images being shared in Exchange Online (EXO) and Teams Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Identify Teams as data sources (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Simplified picking of relevant Teams and channels (standard, private, and shared) to intelligently identify associated custodian mailboxes, group mailboxes, OneDrive for Business accounts, and SharePoint sites that may contain Teams data that's relevant to your case.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Identify Teams as data sources (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Simplified picking of relevant Teams and channels (standard, private, and shared) to intelligently identify associated custodian mailboxes, group mailboxes, OneDrive for Business accounts, and SharePoint sites that may contain Teams data that's relevant to your case.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Embed Teams Chat in Outlook Web
CurrentVersion.description: Teams embedded chat in Outlook web allows users to stay on top of their chats without leaving Outlook.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Embed Teams Chat in Outlook Web
OldVersion.description: Teams embedded chat in Outlook web allows users to stay on top of their chats without leaving Outlook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tenant Allow/Block List Limit per SKU
CurrentVersion.description: Today, customers can only create 500 block and 500 allow entries in sender, URL and file category in Tenant allow/block list. Going ahead, customers with MDO P2 or E5 security can create 5000 allows and 10000 blocks in Tenant allow/block list for sender, URL and file category. Spoof in Tenant allow/block list will remain unaffected by this change and all SKUs will have 1024 entries for both allows and blocks.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tenant Allow/Block List Limit per SKU
OldVersion.description: Today, customers can only create 500 block and 500 allow entries in sender, URL and file category in Tenant allow/block list. Going ahead, customers with MDO P2 or E5 security can create 5000 allows and 10000 blocks in Tenant allow/block list for sender, URL and file category. Spoof in Tenant allow/block list will remain unaffected by this change and all SKUs will have 1024 entries for both allows and blocks.
